page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: There are two {schools} in our area. Pakefield Middle School is situated at G.R. 532 899 and is for children aged from 9 to 13 years of age. It is a single storey, open-plan school and was built approximately 13 years ago. Behind the Middle School at G.R. 532 901 is Pakefield Primary School. This is a much older school, built in about the year 1908. It is constructed of red brick and is two storeys in height. Children who attend the school are aged from 5 to 9 years and transfer to the Middle School. Most of the children who attend these schools live within a radius of about 1 mile of the schools, although some come from as far away as a mile and a half. Both schools are under the jurisdiction of the Suffolk Education Committee whose area office is situated in Lowestoft.
